message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can only pay $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,800. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's close this deal!
